While I waited for Shuri to get her idol outfit\nsorted, I stood by in my room.%K%P
To kill time, I tried to figure out what the pair\nshould do as a duo by looking up ideas on the net.%K%P
After about an hour,\nShuri was finally ready to show her outfit.%K%P
'Thanks for waiting, you two.'%K%P
'How'd your costume come out?'%K%P
'Hmmm... To be honest, I'm not really sure. \nI just kind of told them what I wanted,\nand left the details up to them.'%K%P
I wondered if it was a good idea to be so vague\nabout her own outfit, but actually most goddesses\ndid the same.%K%P
We usually just asked what general image they wanted,\nthen used that for a more striking design. That's\nwhy Tatsumi's was so popular with goddesses, in fact.%K%P
'It would have just taken too much time\nto decide each little detail, so that might\nhave been the best way.'%K%P
The audition qualifier had already started.%K%P
If she wanted to show off her new outfit,\nshe needed it to be finished as soon as possible.%K%P
'And it looks like Sara is going\nto offer some advice, too!'%K%P
'No way, is that allowed?'%K%P
'She's been providing her opinion at Tatsumi's\nfor a while now. I guess she'll be fair,\nso it won't affect the audition.'%K%P
Shuri's outfit wouldn't be getting any special\ntreatment. Other entrants would have exactly\nthe same chance.%K%P
'Well then, now that Ms. Kisshouten is here,\nwhy don't we talk about the duo?'%K%P
'Before that, can I just say something?'%K%P
Shuri said, raising her hand.%K%P
'Could you please stop calling me Ms. Kisshouten?'%K%P
'Yeah, that was bothering me too! \nYou just call me Kagura, don't you think\nit's weird that she gets called Ms.?' %K%P
'You don't mind if I just call you Shuri...?'%K%P
'I don't mind at all.\nJust treat me the same as Kagura.'%K%P
'Okay, got it, Shuri.'%K%P
'Good.'%K%P
Shuri seemed pretty condescending, unlike Kagura,\nbut I guessed I could let it go since it was just\nher character.%K%P
'Let's start with what we know\nof your current situation.'%K%P
I opened up the site for\nLâ˜†SEVEN's new member audition.%K%P
There was all kinds of stuff on there, but mainly\nit announced the voting results in real time.%K%P
'My current ranking is... Ugh, yep, still 39th. \nI'm terrible...'%K%P
Shuri's rank hadn't changed since\nshe had told us what it was earlier.%K%P
Currently, there were 52 goddesses in the preliminaries. \nWhen you thought of it that way, Shuri was far\ninto the bottom half.%K%P
'Next, let's look at Kagura.'%K%P
'I'm 34th! \nI keep moving up and down in this same area...'%K%P
'But you're still above me, you should be happy!'%K%P
They'd paired up into one duo,\nbut they were still rivals.%K%P
Once they noticed even the smallest\ndifference in rank, it would be tough to let it go.%K%P
'You need to think of this ranking as just a point\nof reference. The problem is, how do you move\nup the ranks?'%K%P
I felt sorry to say it but, it didn't seem like Shuri\nor Kagura had any particular plans for the qualifier.%K%P
As hatchling Divine Idols,\nthey were just doing the same thing as always.%K%P
'So, how do you think we can move up, Yamato?'%K%P
'You've only just formed the duo, so nothing's\ngoing to change immediately. You have to take it easy\nand let everyone find things out little by little.'%K%P
'You can say we should take it easy,\nsure, but we don't have much time left.'%K%P
'I know, I know. So you have to use the time\nyou have left efficiently. You have to announce\nwhat you're doing as a duo every day.'%K%P
'If you guys try lots of stuff, building your pairing\nthrough trial and error, and let everyone see that,\nI think it would be really interesting.%K%P
'That's not bad.\nI bet the fans would really go for it.'%K%P
'And it's impossible to get everything perfect right\noff the bat. So we should just work on getting\nbetter little by little.'%K%P
It looked like Shuri and Kagura agreed. \nSo all that was left was to get started.%K%P
'So, the first thing is to announce\nthe formation of your duo!'%K%P
I switched my smartphone to record video,\nand turned it on Shuri and Kagura.%K%P
Goddesses in the competition could upload\npictures and videos to the audition website.%K%P
'Huh? 'Hey! You aren't recording yet, are you?'%K%P
'What about my idol outfit?'%K%P
'I've only got my uniform,\nso you have to match me, Kagura.'%K%P
Luckily they went to the same school, so their\nmatching uniforms helped them look like a real duo.%K%P
'Ready? \nLet's get rolling!'%K%P
'W-Wait! Isn't this is a bit too sudden? \nLike, we just announce our pairing up like this?\nWhat should we say?'%K%P
'Why not just say our names, and something like\n'We're forming a duo!' or whatever?'%K%P
'Is that all? Is that enough?'%K%P
'You're a duo that started though momentum\nand improvisation, so I think that's a good\nway to start.'%K%P
Rather, that's about all these two can\nhandle right now.%K%P
They just ran into each other the first time today,\nand became a duo to help break through\nthe audition qualifier.%K%P
Right now they're just riding the moment,\nwho knows what will happen after this. \nIt's exciting just thinking about it.%K%P
'Okay, we're rolling!'%K%P
This time they let me start recording.%K%P
Shuri was still flustered, while beside her Kagura\nkept poking her with her elbow.%K%P
'Huh? Wait, am I going first?'%K%P
'I-I'm Shuri Kisshouten!'%K%P
'And I'm Kagura Amauzu!'%K%P
'Kagura and I would like to announce that\nwe have formed a new duo!'%K%P
'Yaaay, applause!'%K%P
'Hey, you say something too, Kagura!'%K%P
'Yes ma'am! \nWell, to break through the qualifier rankings,\nwe two rivals have joined forces!'%K%P
'It might have been impossible for each of us alone,\nbut we'll get somewhere together!'%K%P
'To tell the truth, I'm really not sure\nif she is the right partner for me...'%K%P
'Hold on a minute, that's my line! I mean,\nI'm already higher in the rankings than you are!'%K%P
'W-well, at the bottom of the rankings,\nlittle differences like that don't really mean\nanything!'%K%P
'Even so, I'm still higher up! \nWhich means I'm more popular than you are!'%K%P
'Grrr....'%K%P
'And so in this duo, I should be the leader!'%K%P
'You stop right there!\nThat is completely unacceptable!'%K%P
'Nooo way. This is a done deal. \nOur name will be Kagura & Shuri!'%K%P
'I think you mean Shuri & Kagura! \nBut anyway, what kind of duo name is that,\njust our names together?'%K%P
'We can make a formal decision about it later. \nAnyway, even if it's just temporary, we need a name!'%K%P
'I-I guess you're right. \nOkay, 'Shuri & Kagura (TBC) it is.'%K%P
'It's Kagura & Shuri (TBC)!'%K%P
'Grrr....'%K%P
'Hrrrggg...'%K%P
'Okay, cut! \nOh, you two are perfect together!'%K%P
I figured that was the perfect timing\nto end the video.%K%P
Just then, the two of them came back to their senses.%K%P
'Hold on, surely you aren't going to use\nall of that? Aren't we going to do another take?'%K%P
'Why? You guys were great!'%K%P
'But, just when we announced our new group,\nwe got into an argument!'%K%P
'That's right, so you should have just given in\nand let us be Kagura & Shuri (TBC)!' %K%P
'Oh, you are so stubborn!'%K%P
'You're the one who keeps fighting over\nevery little thing!'%K%P
Shuri and Kagura reached critical mass\nalmost immediately. Their personalities were\nfundamentally just too different.%K%P
'I think it's great if you start out rough. \nThat way, the attraction becomes wondering\nhow you'll ever make it.'%K%P
'I-I see...'%K%P
'I really am something. You didn't even need to\ntell me, I just understood that.'%K%P
'You didn't understand anything!'%K%P
If they could keep up this kind of back and forth,\nthey had so much potential.%K%P
And as for the point of contention, the duo name...%K%P
'Since you guys are arguing over the name so much,\nwhy not leave that up to a vote as well?'%K%P
We could decide it based on comments fans\nleave on the video. After all, it's just a temporary\nname, so changing it won't be a problem.%K%P
'That sounds interesting. It's got a hook to it,\nand I like that it can get people involved.'%K%P
'Alright then, let's get it uploaded!'%K%P
Since it was settled, I uploaded the video\nto each of their accounts directly from my\nsmartphone.%K%P
Then, I left a comment asking for people to vote on\nthe temporary name, and we were all ready.%K%P
'What's happening, what's happening?'%K%P
'It's too soon, nothing's going to happen yet.'%K%P
'Oh, we got a comment! \nWhoa, that was fast!'%K%P
'That's one vote for Shuri & Kagura (TBC)!'%K%P
'Well, it's just getting started...'%K%P
'Oh, well, I guess we will see then, won't we?'%K%P
This audition was getting a lot of attention,\nso the responses were really was fast.%K%P
The view count was already going through the roof,\nand comments were rolling in.%K%P
'I think it does have a good hook,\nyou're off to a good start!'%K%P
'Yeah, it's going just like we'd hoped!'%K%P
'But really, it's mostly all Yamato's idea.'%K%P
'I-I know that. \nI'm grateful, of course.'%K%P
'Thanks, Yamato... It looks like it's going to work\nout okay, thanks to you.'%K%P
Apparently it was embarrassing having to thank\nme again, as Shuri's face went bright red and she\nkept fidgeting.%K%P
Being treated like that made\nme feel self-conscious, too.%K%P
'W-well, at any rate, it looks like your duo\nis officially started. Let's keep this momentum up.'%K%P
'Right!'%K%P
